column5: StarHill Farms is a rolling 300+ acre setting nestled between Mill Creek and Sandy Creek in Austin County, Texas. It is conveniently located between Houston, Austin, and San Antonio. Our Cabin on the Hill is a historic Seidel Family 1849 Austin County Cabin relocated to a secluded hilltop spot overlooking Mill Creek. It is fully renovated with custom fixtures, reclaimed wood, and some improvements as well as one of a kind antiques.
column8: StarHill Farms Cabin on the Hill
